name: Sweet House: Design
description:
This is a villa that belongs to you, you can decorate it into your favorite style! Maybe your family is not with you, but here are your assistants, butlers and maids! This is a brand new home game, come join us!

- Move the icons and connect them to 3 or more tiles to eliminate them
- Each level has a number of steps, you need to complete them within a limited number of steps
- Get the stars after completing the level
- A lot of new areas, need to open them with stars
- All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your favorite style
- A fascinating plot
- A wide variety of characters and friends

Sweet House is a match-3 puzzle game!
It is a family game!
Play games with friends on Facebook!
There is also a wealth of single player content!
No need to connect to the Internet (offline)!
